author: COMSOL
description: This example investigates the thermal decomposition of methane over a solid Ni-Al₂O₃ catalyst. Hydrogen gas and solid carbon are formed as products. Carbon deposits inhibit the catalyst activity and decrease the permeability of the reactor. The process is modeled both with the Reaction Engineering interface in a perfectly mixed environment and with a space-dependent model.
label: carbon_deposition.mph
name: root
